languages.text: {n}Кибелла хмурится.{/n} "Твои шутки неуместны. Мое сознание — плод тренировок и умерщвления плоти, призванных оградить мысли от чуждого влияния. И все же ты проник{mf||ла} в мой внутренний взор, нарушив ритуал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла хмурится.{/n} "Твои шутки неуместны. Мое сознание — плод тренировок и умерщвления плоти, призванных оградить мысли от чуждого влияния. И все же, несмотря на это, ты проник{mf||ла} в мой внутренний взор, нарушив ритуал".

languages.text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла хмурится.{/n} "Твои шутки неуместны. Мое сознание — плод тренировок и умерщвления плоти, призванных оградить мысли от чуждого влияния. И все же ты проник{mf||ла} в мой внутренний взор, нарушив ритуал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. Yet still you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the ritual at risk."

{n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

{n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

languages.text: {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Scherze sind nun wirklich nicht angebracht. Durch Übung und Abstinenz ist mein Verstand für äußere Einflüsse absolut uneinnehmbar. Und dennoch habt Ihr Euch vor mein geistiges Auge gedrängt und das ganze Ritual riskiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Scherze sind nun wirklich nicht angebracht. Durch Übung und Abstinenz ist mein Verstand für äußere Einflüsse absolut uneinnehmbar. Und dennoch habt Ihr Euch vor mein geistiges Auge gedrängt und das ganze Ritual riskiert."

languages.text: {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Ha elegido un mal momento para bromear. A través del entrenamiento y la abstinencia, mi mente se ha vuelto impenetrable contra las influencias externas. Y, aun así, se abrió paso hasta ella, lo que puso en peligro el ritual al completo».
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Ha elegido un mal momento para bromear. A través del entrenamiento y la abstinencia, mi mente se ha vuelto impenetrable contra las influencias externas. Y, aun así, se abrió paso hasta ella, lo que puso en peligro el ritual al completo».

languages.text: {n}彼女の眉が寄せられる。{/n}「ジョークを言うには悪いタイミングを選んだわね。訓練と禁欲を通じて、私の心は外からの影響を受けづらくなるよう形成されてきたの。だというのに、あなたは私の心の目に無理やり入り込んできて、儀式全体を危険にさらしたのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の眉が寄せられる。{/n}「ジョークを言うには悪いタイミングを選んだわね。訓練と禁欲を通じて、私の心は外からの影響を受けづらくなるよう形成されてきたの。だというのに、あなたは私の心の目に無理やり入り込んできて、儀式全体を危険にさらしたのよ」

languages.text: {n}她皱起了眉头。{/n}“现在可不是开玩笑的时候。通过训练与戒律，我的思想原本已经被塑造成了不会受外界影响的状态，但你还是强行进入了我的心灵之眼，将整个仪式都置于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}她皱起了眉头。{/n}“现在可不是开玩笑的时候。通过训练与戒律，我的思想原本已经被塑造成了不会受外界影响的状态，但你还是强行进入了我的心灵之眼，将整个仪式都置于危险之中。”

languages.text: {n}Elle fronce les sourcils.{/n} « L'heure n'est pas à la plaisanterie. À force d'entraînement et d'abstinence, j'étais parvenue à préserver mon esprit des influences extérieures, mais vous, vous avez réussi à franchir toutes mes barrières et avez mis le rituel en péril. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle fronce les sourcils.{/n} « L'heure n'est pas à la plaisanterie. À force d'entraînement et d'abstinence, j'étais parvenue à préserver mon esprit des influences extérieures, mais vous, vous avez réussi à franchir toutes mes barrières et avez mis le rituel en péril. »

languages.text: {n}Kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Şaka yapmak için kötü bir zaman seçtin. Zihnim, yaptığım idmanlar ve perhiz sayesinde dış etkenlerin işlemediği bir hâle büründü. Yine de zihnime zorla girip tüm ayini riske atmaya çalışıyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Her brow furrows.{/n} "You've chosen a poor time for jests. Through training and abstinence, my mind has been shaped to be impenetrable to outside influence. And still, you forced your way into my mind's eye and put the whole ritual at risk."
